channel.title: Comments on: New AT&T Data Plans

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/06/04/new-att-data-plans/#comment-3448">Alex (Viper007Bond)</a>.
Couldn't agree more, I don't see how anyone could describe the additional tethering fee as anything but pure, over the top, greed.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Alex (Viper007Bond).

Couldn’t agree more, I don’t see how anyone could describe the additional tethering fee as anything but pure, over the top, greed.

item.title: By: Alex (Viper007Bond)
item.dc:creator: Alex (Viper007Bond)
item.description: The tethering fee drives me nuts. I'm already paying for the bandwidth, why should I have to pay an additional $20 to use it via a different method?
item.content:encoded: The tethering fee drives me nuts. I’m already paying for the bandwidth, why should I have to pay an additional $20 to use it via a different method?
